experiences.title: Lead Software Engineer
description: Redesigning and improving the user experience of the citrix workspace for browser and chrome app platforms.
Building new framework from scratch to render the UI dynamically by layouts and configurations instead of static code.
Improving the launch experience to the users by adopting modern methods like client side caching, web workers, service and shared workers.
Implemening the in-house logging and analytics platforms to handle the load at large scale to cut the 3rd patry integrations

experiences.title: Software Technologist II
description: Developing a framework from scratch by following best software design practices to render complex dynamic and configurable web pages without compromising Philips design standards.
Participating in team-led solutions.Reviewing peer's code for quality. Identify development issues, brainstorm solutions, and constantly improving the solution via testing.
Ramp-up team of size 10 to apply software engineering practices and implement automation across all elements of solution delivery
Improved application performance by optimizing database queries and frontend dashboards rendering.

experiences.title: Senior Systems Engineer
description: Implemented Windows service developed to read e-mails from mail servers automatically and send acknowledgement mails after invoice processing

Implemented Form builder tool from scratch to create web forms easily and in a less amount of time. It combines the functionality of creating web forms and writing database logics as per the page requests using simple configurations

Implemented Market insight portals from scratch where the user can see the price trends of the different commodities from the configured websites in a graphical representation. And the user can also view the relevant news from the configured urls and the news will be curated based on keywords
